mapper.select: SELECT id, account, password, level, isUsed, createTime, info FROM user WHERE account=#{account}
SELECT id, account, password, level, isUsed, createTime, info FROM user ORDER BY createTime DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (account, password, level, isUsed, createTime, info) VALUE(#{account}, #{password}, #{level}, #{isUsed}, #{createTime}, #{info})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET account=#{account}, password=#{password}, level=#{level}, isUsed=#{isUsed}, createTime=#{createTime}, info=#{info} WHERE id=#{id}
